definition: to be good at understanding others (idiom)
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: With his head stuck on the ground, the poor man acknowledged her kindness and beckoned the woman to go away.
sentences.chinese: 乞丐善解人意地趴在地上擺了擺手，示意女人離開。

sentences.english: I am a traditional Chinese lady, tender, virtuous, loving, enjoy life. Like travel, sports, nature, beastie.
sentences.chinese: 我是一位傳統的中國女性，溫柔賢惠，善解人意。

sentences.english: Thanks for being so understanding - I owe you one.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你如此善解人意，我欠你一次人情。

sentences.english: Type FOURs are empathetic to feelings of others.
sentences.chinese: 重視別人的感情世界的悲與喜，善解人意。

sentences.english: I like to dress up as nice clowns and scary ones.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡裝扮成善解人意的小丑和膽小的小丑。

sentences.english: “Yeah, I’m a very understanding kinda guy, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “嗯，我是那種非常善解人意的人，”他說。

sentences.english: She's an empath and wants to connect, make you feel comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 她善解人意，願意交流感情，讓你感覺舒適。

sentences.english: Is he or she emotionally supportive or have control issues?
sentences.chinese: 她或他是善解人意體貼人還是有控制慾問題？

sentences.english: Showing I know the difference between keeping the rules and listening with understanding.
sentences.chinese: 懂得遵守規則與用善解人意的心去傾聽之間的區別。

sentences.english: You will almost always find that they are much more understanding, perhaps even relieved, than you think they will be.
sentences.chinese: 你會發現他們總是比你想象的來得更加善解人意。
喜歡小動物，善良，善解人意。

sentences.english: I am with good intention amiably , may accept the new thing but maintains own principle.
sentences.chinese: 我隨和善解人意，可以接受新事物但保持自己的原則。

sentences.english: Jane is one of the girls who are considerate and helpful.
sentences.chinese: 簡屬於那種既善解人意又樂於助人的女孩子。

sentences.english: If he says yes, punish him for his insensitivity .
sentences.chinese: 如果他說胖，就懲罰他不善解人意。

definition: fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
see 通情達理|通情达理[tong1 qing2 da2 li3]
(of a wife) wise and kind/perfect in her traditional roles
